docs.snippet: The defensive end was operated on for a sports hernia and an injured groin muscle; he will reportedly miss the rest of the regular season and probably the first two weeks of the playoffs....
docs.lead_paragraph: The defensive end was operated on for a sports hernia and an injured groin muscle; he will reportedly miss the rest of the regular season and probably the first two weeks of the playoffs.
docs.abstract: New York Giants defensive end Jason Pierre-Paul undergoes surgery to repair what team is calling core muscle injury, and will be sidelined for at least remainder of regular season.

headline.main: Giants’ Jason Pierre-Paul Out After Sports Hernia Surgery
headline.print_headline: Pierre-Paul Is Sidelined After a Hernia Operation

docs.snippet: A tiff involving receiver Victor Cruz was resolved, but Jason Pierre-Paul’s defensive teammates expect him to miss a big game against the Cowboys....
